item.title: After booting
item.description: The image is not tuned, and has only been configured to boot in as many providers as possible, therefore extra adjustments need to be done after booting, starting by removing/changing the password for the user devops In case not using GCE the mtu 1460 option may be removed from the rc.conf: ifconfig_DEFAULT="SYNCDHCP mtu 1460" To: ifconfig_DEFAULT="SYNCDHCP" The image has been build using this src.conf, this kernel and the jail using this src-jail.
